segments.text: Steven , you are always looking in good shape . How do you keep it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I pay much attention to my daily diet . You know good eating habits help to fortify the body against disease .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , you are right . Tell me your normal diet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I eat more fruits and vegetables and limit amounts of fatty and fried foods .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I drink milk every day . It's really good for building strong bones and teeth . I drink tea quite often , for it's protective against kidney cancer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no wonder you are healthy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are what you eat , and a healthy diet creates a body resistant to disease .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks for sharing your experience with me .
segments.speaker: S1
